005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj;
006
007/**
008 * This interface allows for PIDController to automatically read from this object.
009 *
010 * <p>This class is provided by the OldCommands VendorDep
011 *
012 * @deprecated Use DoubleSupplier and new PIDController class.
013 */
014@Deprecated(since = "2020", forRemoval = true)
015public interface PIDSource {
016  /**
017   * Set which parameter of the device you are using as a process control variable.
018   *
019   * @param pidSource An enum to select the parameter.
020   */
021  void setPIDSourceType(PIDSourceType pidSource);
022
023  /**
024   * Get which parameter of the device you are using as a process control variable.
025   *
026   * @return the currently selected PID source parameter
027   */
028  PIDSourceType getPIDSourceType();
029
030  /**
031   * Get the result to use in PIDController.
032   *
033   * @return the result to use in PIDController
034   */
035  double pidGet();
036}
